title: France panorama. [No. 74/33]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Fashions - French models in Istanbul. Spic and span - keeping the Metro clean. 2. Museum laboratory - at the Chateau de Champ. 3. Gilbert Cesbron and the suburbs - Cesbron’s last work. 4. The arts - Patrice Hughes and his prints.
